result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ حَكِيمٌ
result.translation: N’iyo bitaza kuba ingabire za Allah n’impuhwe ze kuri mwe, ndetse no kuba mu by’ukuri Allah ari we wakira ukwicuza, Nyirubugenge buhambaye; (umubeshyi muri mwe yari guhita agerwaho n’ibyo yisabiye).
